channel.title: Command Help!
channel.description: How do i make item spawning commands such as ::ownerstuff or something?

item.title: Command Help!
item.dc:creator: @I_X_Wolf_X_I I X Wolf X I
item.description:
@I_X_Wolf_X_I wrote:

[quote=“sitebanis, post:4, topic:147938”]just put this in your client.java

if (command.startsWith("COMMAND HERE") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); }

hope this helps
=)[/quote]wait doesn’t this go under commands.txt?

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help!
item.dc:creator: @sitebanis sitebanis
item.description:
@sitebanis wrote:

ya try what I posted
dont put “p.” before item

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help!
item.dc:creator: @I_X_Wolf_X_I I X Wolf X I
item.description:
@I_X_Wolf_X_I wrote:

[quote=“sitebanis, post:4, topic:147938”]just put this in your client.java

if (command.startsWith("COMMAND HERE") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); }

hope this helps
=)[/quote] i’ll give that a try because i did this for the code: if (command.startsWith("COMMAND HERE") && playerRights >= 0) { p.addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); p.addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); p.addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); p.addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); } Because thats what i was told to do.
[br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2007, 03:00:11 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Waffles!!, post:5, topic:147938”]Because you can’t actually use COMMANDNAME and ITEMID, AMOUNT[/quote] i know i didn’t use the COMMANDNAME and ITEMID, AMOUNT…

Read full topic

to put a space after the “,” next to the “ID HERE”

item.title: Command Help!
item.dc:creator: @sitebanis sitebanis
item.description:
@sitebanis wrote:

just put this in your client.java

if (command.startsWith("COMMAND HERE") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); addItem(ID HERE, QUANTITY); }

hope this helps
=)

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help!
item.dc:creator: @I_X_Wolf_X_I I X Wolf X I
item.description:
@I_X_Wolf_X_I wrote:

[quote=“Waffles!!, post:2, topic:147938”]if (command.startsWith(“COMMANDNAME”)) {
addItem(ID, AMOUNT);
addItem(ID, AMOUNT);
addItem(ID, AMOUNT);
addItem(ID, AMOUNT);
addItem(ID, AMOUNT);
addItem(ID, AMOUNT); }[/quote] I’ve tried that it doesn’t work… i’ve tried 5 times redoing it over and over but i can’t get the command to actually work!

Read full topic

item.title: Command Help!
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“COMMANDNAME”)) {
addItem(ID, AMOUNT);
addItem(ID, AMOUNT);
addItem(ID, AMOUNT);
addItem(ID, AMOUNT);
addItem(ID, AMOUNT);
addItem(ID, AMOUNT); }

Read full topic
